previous.excerpt:
TSLA, SQ, SE, NET, NIO, PLTR and many others I haven't mentioned and even the
ARK ETFs, have all 5-20X'd since the pandemic began.

Usually when people like Peter Lynch talk about the elusive 10-bagger stocks...
The ones that are supposed to be rare to find... He usually talks about 5-10
year…
previous.title: A lot of Reddit's meme stocks have 5-20X'd in just 8 months since the pandemic began. Is anyone else concerned?

localize.title: 很多Reddit的Meme股票在大流行开始后的短短8个月内就增加了5-20倍。还有其他人关心吗？
localize.the_new_excerpt:
TSLA、SQ、SE、NET、NIO、PLTR和许多其他我没有提到的，甚至
方舟ETF，自大流行开始以来都有5-20倍的收益。

通常，当像彼得·林奇这样的人谈论难以捉摸的10袋股票时…
那些被认为是很难找到的..。他通常说的是5-10
年份…

localize.title: 很多Reddit的Meme股票在大流行開始後的短短8個月內就增加了5-20倍。還有其他人關心嗎？
localize.the_new_excerpt:
TSLA、SQ、SE、NET、NIO、PLTR和許多其他我沒有提到的，甚至
方舟ETF，自大流行開始以來都有5-20倍的收益。

通常，當像彼得·林奇這樣的人談論難以捉摸的10袋股票時…
那些被認爲是很難找到的..。他通常說的是5-10
年份…

- SEDG (SolarEdge)



What's your pick?
